location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 17/15 II Government Property: Advances for the purchase and up-keep of cars'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Circular issued by the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, distributing a copy of Government of India Finance Department Memorandum D 7526-N/46, advising that Government servants may be granted advances for the purchase of motor cars.
